name: DBConvert
short_description: DBConvert is a cross converter for HanDBase-, List-, JFile-, MobileDB-, PilotDB, P. Referencer-, MS-Access-, DBase- and Foxpro- databases, as well as MS-Excel spreadsheets, CSV- and XML files.
